comments:
On executing the adopter usage scan on a product zip, the scan throws numerous exceptions of the following, which may be due to attempting to scan a jar embedded in a war?

The scanning of wars and ears seems like overkill for the general purpose of the scans, so I removed the scanning of wars, which was the one throwing the exceptions.
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
